body:
Hi!
> Anyone have any objections to a Sept. 20-22 schedule for the 2010 
> workshop?
No, not to the schedule, but out of curiousity - is there also any 
pre-announcement on the location?


I would love to finally make it to a Radiance Workshops after 
systematically (not intentionally) missing them so far, and now I am 
waiting for the good news on the location...


Cheers, Lars.
___
